headline: Barclays Cuts FactSet (FDS) Target to $210, Keeps Underweight Rating
summary: FactSet Research Systems Inc. (NYSE:FDS) is one of the 13 High-Quality S&P 500 Financial Stocks According to Hedge Funds. On February 20, 2026, Barclays analyst Manav Patnaik lowered the price target on FactSet Research Systems Inc. (NYSE:FDS) from $300 to $210 while keeping an Underweight rating on the shares. The firm cited intensified investor anxieties, […]

headline: FactSet’s AI Push With Claude And Kepler Tied To Valuation Gap
summary: FactSet Research Systems (NYSE:FDS) has integrated its financial market data with Anthropic's AI model Claude, expanding its AI driven tools for clients. The company has also formed a new partnership with Kepler Cheuvreux to bring aftermarket research into FactSet’s platform for EMEA clients using AI tools. Together, these moves represent a material update to FactSet’s data platform and research capabilities in the market data sector. FactSet, a long established data and analytics provider...
